channel.title: Performance on Keith Atherton
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Keith Atherton

item.title: Power App Performance Measuring
item.description: Recently, I needed a way to measure how long some Power Fx code in a Power App took to process. This was so that I could measure the performance before and after I made changes to the Power Fx code, to see if my changes improved the performance. [Spoiler alert: In this case, the performance was actually worse after my changes! Still, by measuring the performance, I was able to know this for sure then change direction…]
